Key Match Events: Dani Olmo scored the opening goal for Spain
Florian Wirtz scored the equalizer for Germany
Mikel Merino scored the winning goal for Spain in extra time
Pre-Game Insights: Spain is considered the favorite to win Euro 2024
Germany's approach to the game was physical
Pedri was forced off due to an injury caused by Toni Kroos' challenge
Post-Match Reflections: Spain's victory over Germany is a vital step in their development
Germany's defeat belongs in proper context and is not a cause for introspection
The disappointment of Germany's exit from the tournament will be the loss of the fun, fan parks, and sense of national unity
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Stuttgart
The game was a quarter-final match of Euro 2024
Others: The game went to extra time
Julian Nagelsmann is the coach of Germany
Mikel Merino's winning goal was a header
